Posts.Content: Ooh I understand Hun , mine is secondaries sadly but I will keep fighting the god dam thing xxxand so will you Hun xx  Debbie
Posts.Title: Hi I am so so sad today my breast cancer is back

Posts.Content: Aww god bless you ... I had breast cancer in 2003 and it returned in September 2015 .. I also lost my mum to the awful disease ... collect your thoughts over the next few days and whilst doing that tell yourself this is an illness I can live with .... and we are all here to help one another in the fight ... I'm here should you need to chat Xxx
Posts.Title: Hi I am so so sad today my breast cancer is back

Posts.Content: Aww this has made me smile so much so true live your life and I agree try to keep positive , but on occasions you will have your bad days for sure. I've just been for some results today after a CT scan last week after having started a new drug and every thing is stable so I'm so so pleased, just wish it would disappear out of the liver :-(  Love and hugs to you all Debbie Xx
